wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Kenneth William Wood (born 3 April 1993) is an English cricketer. Wood is a left-handed batsman who bowls right-arm off break. He was born at Nottingham, Nottinghamshire and educated at the Colonel Frank Seely School in Nottingham.

response: Samuel or Sam Wood may refer to:
*Sam Wood (rugby league, born 1994), English rugby league player
*Sam Wood (rugby league, born 1997), English rugby league player
